${ModID}:ArtilleryCargo.NAME: Artillery Cargo
${ModID}:ArtilleryCargo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy.

${ModID}:Avalanche.NAME: Avalanche
${ModID}:Avalanche.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. If your snowpunk:Engine is snowpunk:Frozen, deal that damage again.

${ModID}:BeaconBeam.NAME: Beacon Beam
${ModID}:BeaconBeam.DESCRIPTION: Attacks deal !M! additional damage for each snowpunk:Snowball you have.
${ModID}:BeaconBeam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Attacks deal !M! additional damage for each snowpunk:Snowball you have.

${ModID}:BlackIce.NAME: Black Ice
${ModID}:BlackIce.DESCRIPTION: Apply snowpunk:S Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:BlackIce.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply snowpunk:S snowpunk:Frostbite, Weak, and Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:BrassKnuckles.NAME: Brass Knuckles
${ModID}:BrassKnuckles.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. When snowpunk:Tinkered, increase this card's damage by !M! this combat.

${ModID}:BrassWave.NAME: Brass Wave
${ModID}:BrassWave.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage and gain !B! Block X{!Snowpunk:Info!|1=+1} times.

${ModID}:BuckShot.NAME: Buck Shot
${ModID}:BuckShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage randomly dispersed to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:BurningCoals.NAME: Burning Coals
${ModID}:BurningCoals.DESCRIPTION: snowpunk:Heat a card in your hand.

${ModID}:BurningFury.NAME: Burning Fury
${ModID}:BurningFury.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! snowpunk:Fireballs NL to your hand.

${ModID}:Cauterize.NAME: Cauterize
${ModID}:Cauterize.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply snowpunk:Burn equal to unblocked damage dealt.

${ModID}:ChuckTools.NAME: Chuck Parts
${ModID}:ChuckTools.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Apply !Snowpunk:M2! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Randomly snowpunk:Tinker the next{!M!|>1= !M!} card{!M!|>1=s} you play.

${ModID}:ChuggaChugga.NAME: Chugga Chugga
${ModID}:ChuggaChugga.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL snowpunk:Link two cards in your hand.

${ModID}:ColdSnap.NAME: Cold Snap
${ModID}:ColdSnap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! × snowpunk:S damage and apply snowpunk:S snowpunk:Frostbite to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Comburstion.NAME: Comburstion
${ModID}:Comburstion.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. If your snowpunk:Engine is snowpunk:Overheated, apply !M! snowpunk:Burn to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Defend.NAME: Defend
${ModID}:Defend.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block.{!Snowpunk:Info!|1= NL Block is not removed at the start of your next turn.}

${ModID}:HeatTransfer.NAME: Heat Transfer
${ModID}:HeatTransfer.DESCRIPTION: snowpunk:Hot and snowpunk:Overheated Attacks apply !M! snowpunk:Burn.

${ModID}:IceCube.NAME: Ice Cube
${ModID}:IceCube.DESCRIPTION: Gain snowpunk:S + !M! snowpunk:Ice. NL Exhausts if snowpunk:Heated.

${ModID}:IcicleSpear.NAME: Icicle Spear
${ModID}:IcicleSpear.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL snowpunk:Cool this card.

${ModID}:Ignite.NAME: Ignite
${ModID}:Ignite.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! snowpunk:Burn to ALL enemies. NL snowpunk:Sooty enemies gain additional snowpunk:Burn equal to their snowpunk:Soot.

${ModID}:Invent.NAME: Invent
${ModID}:Invent.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Fleeting. NL snowpunk:Assemble a{!Snowpunk:Info!|0=n snowpunk:Invention|1= snowpunk:Creation|>1= snowpunk:Machination}.

${ModID}:NorEaster.NAME: Nor'Easter
${ModID}:NorEaster.DESCRIPTION: snowpunk:Freeze ALL cards. NL snowpunk:Freeze your snowpunk:Engine. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:NorEaster.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: snowpunk:Freeze ALL cards. NL snowpunk:Freeze your snowpunk:Engine. NL Set your snowpunk:Engine's Stable Temperature to snowpunk:Frozen. Exhaust.

${ModID}:PressureValves.NAME: Pressure Valves
${ModID}:PressureValves.DESCRIPTION: Card effects act as if you have !M! more snowpunk:Snowballs.
${ModID}:PressureValves.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Card effects act as if you have X more snowpunk:Snowballs.

${ModID}:Refrigerate.NAME: Refrigerate
${ModID}:Refrigerate.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL snowpunk:Cool this card.

${ModID}:ReleaseValve.NAME: Release Valve
${ModID}:ReleaseValve.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL {!Snowpunk:Info!|0=snowpunk:Heat|1=snowpunk:Overheat} the next {!M!|>1=!M! }card{!M!|>1=s} you play.

${ModID}:Resupply.NAME: Resupply
${ModID}:Resupply.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Cards drawn this way are randomly snowpunk:Tinkered.

${ModID}:RollingCoal.NAME: Rolling Coal
${ModID}:RollingCoal.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! snowpunk:Soot to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Singe.NAME: Singe
${ModID}:Singe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, gain !M! snowpunk:Fireballs.

${ModID}:Sledding.NAME: Sledding
${ModID}:Sledding.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! × snowpunk:S damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Snowblower.NAME: Snowblower
${ModID}:Snowblower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Gain !M! snowpunk:Snowballs.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X + 1 times. NL Gain X + 1 snowpunk:Snowballs.

${ModID}:Snowfall.NAME: Snowfall
${ModID}:Snowfall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !D! damage to a random enemy snowpunk:S times. NL snowpunk:Cool all cards in your hand.

${ModID}:SnowStack.NAME: Snow Stack
${ModID}:SnowStack.DESCRIPTION: {@@}snowpunk:Frosty. NL Gain !B! Block.{!M!|>0= NL Gain !M! snowpunk:Snowball}{!M!|>1=s}{!M!|>0=.}

${ModID}:SteamForm.NAME: Steam Form
${ModID}:SteamForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! snowpunk:Steam. NL snowpunk:Steam no longer Exhausts cards.
${ModID}:SteamForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, gain !M! snowpunk:Steam. NL snowpunk:Steam no longer Exhausts cards.

${ModID}:Stronger.NAME: Stronger
${ModID}:Stronger.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted, gain !M! Strength.

${ModID}:Think.NAME: Think
${ModID}:Think.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL snowpunk:Tinker a card in your hand.

${ModID}:TrolleyForm.NAME: Trolley Form
${ModID}:TrolleyForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, you may pull the lever to divert the runaway trolley onto the side track.

${ModID}:TheCryogenizer.NAME: The Cryogenizer
${ModID}:TheCryogenizer.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!Snowpunk:Info!|1=Unplayable below snowpunk:Hot. NL }Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
${ModID}:TheCryogenizer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!Snowpunk:Info!|1=Unplayable below snowpunk:Stable. NL }Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:WaterTank.NAME: Water Tank
${ModID}:WaterTank.DESCRIPTION: snowpunk:Ventilation. NL Temperature effects from this card are !Snowpunk:Info! times stronger.

${ModID}:WinterStorm.NAME: Winter Storm
${ModID}:WinterStorm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply !M! snowpunk:Frostbite to ALL enemies.
